file_content.text: The Gormak mine a crystal outcropping. Crystals for Mystics.
The Gormak use the crystals, tame beasts, improve them for war. It must stop.
My order uses Force-imbued crystals in our weapons. They can affect a simple creature's mind.
You mean lightsaber crystals?
What do the Gormak do to these creatures once they're tamed?
"Improve" sounds ominous.
Beasts are fitted with machinery.
A simple task for Voss commandos.
So stop them.
Crystals must be reclaimed. The Gormak have an army. We need help.
Hunting Gormak. Proper use of my intuition.
We can stop Gormak patrols. Their mining operation remains. I have few men. You are skilled.
The Gormak will be prepared for Voss commandos, not a Jedi Master.
They wouldn't expect a Jedi.
Skilled, yes, not suicidal.
You will go unnoticed.
I'll stop the mining operation, if I can keep any crystal I find.
Pay me in crystals.
The crystals are for--it is your price.
We and Gaden-Ko will distract most Gormak. More guard the mines.
Do this, please. We will meet you here.
I contemplate the carving, for a sign to guide me.
All shards are one... the pattern is--is....
Jedi, for the benefit of those who don't find walls enlightening, hurry this up.
No vision or sign. Improper.
Insights come in their own time, not at our convenience.
Just be patient.
I have waited.
Perhaps when the Gormak broke the stone, they broke the sign, too.
Maybe the carving's faulty.
Outsider strangeness.
What's improper is waiting in a damp cave without results.
No, this is tedious.
A few minutes more.
A shelter. We--Gaden-Ko? Unescorted?
It's good to see a friendly face.
Welcome.
Were you looking for him?
I assure you, Gaden-Ko is quite safe.
He has an escort. Me.
Jenar-Sei, captain, Voss commandos. Our mission, in jeopardy. We had to retreat.
Gaden-Ko. Your intuition would help.
No. I await a sign.
There are no coincidences. You wanted a sign, and these commandos arrived.
They could be the sign.
Your role will be serving the people. Begin with these commandos.
Mystics help others, remember?
I will serve as visionary, not....
Either you waste more time moping here, or you accept the commandos as a sign.
You've already waited.
You do not understand.
I... listen. For now. My sign waits.
Tharan, I'm bored!
